text: Agar kissi aurat ko apney shohar ki bad dimaghi aur bey perwahi ka khof ho to dono aapas mein jo sulah ker len uss mein kissi per koi gunah nahi. Sulah boht behtar cheez hai tama her her cheez mein shamil ker di gaee hai. Agar tum acha sulook kero aur perhezgari kero to tum jo ker rahey ho uss per Allah Taalaa poori tarah khabardaar hai
